attributes.review: He is the worst person ever I have to go home because he has a good night at home I don’t think I can have any money to do that he would be a great friend and if he does not that he can get a job or not he just told him that I can get it to him I wanna was a way I can do that I and will be home and he is coming in the morning I have a meeting and he is going home to do the stuff I have done so I’m sorry but I’m not going home right after work and then I’m just tryna is that I have a meeting at the fort eeeeeeeeee
attributes.title: This is a horrible app

attributes.review: This app is terrible! It automatically started glitching when I opened it. It was filled with things that were very offensive to me. This is an app that will help no one and is harmful to not only my brain but to the phone itself and the people around me. When I had this app open and put my phone on silent. It started making loud pinging noises while I was at a funeral and it was very inappropriate!! I am very upset by the trauma this app has caused me and others. It needs to be deleted from the store IMMEDIATELY! Do NOT download this app!!!!
attributes.title: THE MOST HEINOUS APP IN THIS STORE

attributes.review: I originally got this to show my unending support to my Cheeto dipped god but unfortunately it’s just a horrible app!! It constantly crashes and sent me hundreds of notifications a day. Additionally, my phone battery would drain 10x quicker than before I downloaded it. I blindly trust everything I am told, however I even found some mistakes in the news and information. Good patriots should not have to suffer through this terrible app to support the Cheeto god. Do better dump administration!
attributes.title: Just a little too racist for my liking

attributes.review: One of the things you Have to fill out is a picture of your passport so they can steal your info and in the user guidelines it says that it steals data from your location and if you try and delete the app you will get a notification that your phone is being hacked and all your information is stolen. If you want  to risk your personal information getting leaked to hackers so they can come to your house while your sleeping this is the perfect app for you.
attributes.title: I was hacked because I downloaded this app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting I would become the president but it lied! It lied to me. I tried making my pet bird the president too but that didn’t work either. My microwave and oven do not condone this type of behavior. I would like to speak to the president directly about this Faldo advertising app. It’s not fair, like, and orange gets to be president but my anime ghost can’t? What is this foul app, it is meant for mean dinosaurs and bad microwaves. Do not download this app if you’re expecting something better than a waste of space on your phone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!😼✌🏼
attributes.title: ✨perfect✨

attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway. Because bees don’t care what humans think is impossible.” SEQ. 75 - “INTRO TO BARRY” INT. BENSON HOUSE - DAY ANGLE ON: Sneakers on the ground. Camera PANS UP to reveal BARRY BENSON’S BEDROOM ANGLE ON: Barry’s hand flipping through different sweaters in his closet. BARRY Yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black...oohh, black and yellow... ANGLE ON: Barry wearing the sweater he picked, looking in the mirror. BARRY (CONT’D) Yeah, let’s shake it up a little. He picks the black and yellow on
attributes.title: For you 🥰👨🏼‍🦳🥩👩🏼‍🏫

attributes.review: I can’t explain it. Whenever I look at, interact with or open this app, my eyes begin to burn. I have no diagnosed eye issues, but EXCLUSIVELY when I see this app my eyes begin to water. My forehead throbs. I feel a migraine coming on. I’d try putting on sunglasses, but the sheer...how do I say this...WHITENESS of the app has caused me temporary blindness and migraines. I’m sure other frequent users can relate, and unfortunately it seems some have started to prefer their world that way. Not worth the headache for me. Will be deleting soon (and again in November 2020).
attributes.title: Horrendous Color Scheme!

attributes.review: This app is one of the worst apps in the app store. So When i was walking my dishes my dog started flying so i had to go drive him into a wall then before my cat let me out so it it can go pee inside the app randomly started vibrating and my phone shattered to then i had to take it to the hospital the doctor then made an appointment to come see me since he broke his arm and the nurse made sure that he had covid. all i’m saying is this app brings bad luck because my paralyzed mom started running away again . This app is HORRIBLE . Do NOT recommend 😡
attributes.title: UNACCEPTABLE

attributes.review: I was walking down my street when I got a beep beep and of course the first thing I do is open up this app that my dear beloved president blessed me with and all I see are the words “check yo house ;)” I think omg did my beautiful prez leave me a present at my front steps *giggle*. So I quickly run back to my house to see it up in flames 😔 and a note on my lawn saying “leave a 5 star review or else” so of course I had to delete the app, get a new phone, change my identity, dye my hair a different color because big Cheeto man is after me 😱
attributes.title: THIS APP SET MY HOUSE ON FIRE

attributes.review: Guys don’t get this app. I just got it and a few seconds later an Oompa Loompa came outa the screen and attacked me 🥳🧚🏻🥰💫 so I did wut I had to do and attacked back like I snatched it’s weave yahhh yeet he was like👁👄👁 so I punched its nose and it cracked its was like “hey guys welcome back to another a s m r where today we will be doing nose cracking” after that Oompa Loompa came at me he was like throwing hands so I got my friends in and we ganged him  pow pow ✨⭐️👅🍭🍦 we threw it beat up orange looking tangerine back into the screen phew that was scary don’t ever get this app or else the Oompa Loompa comin after u 🧞‍♂️💓☺️🔥
attributes.title: Ouch
